# **WHY KENYA ??**
This was the question that baffeled me the most. Why does this small country of **47.6 million** produce the highest number of marathon winners in the world .
After researching for i while i found this -
[Research](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22634972/)


Turns out , not genetics but favorable somatotypical characteristics are the reason that these distance runners dominate the records.

Also I learned about [Eliud Kipchoge](https://www.wsj.com/articles/eliud-kipchoge-is-first-to-run-marathon-in-under-two-hours-11570868202#:~:text=VIENNA%E2%80%94Kenyan%20marathoner%20Eliud%20Kipchoge,event%20in%20Vienna%20on%20Saturday.), who recently broke the 2hr barrier .
